blinded.description: Blinded: The creature cannot see, loses its Dexterity bonus to AC and all dodge bonuses, takes a -2 penalty to AC, and suffers a -5 penalty on Dexterity- and Strength-based skill checks.

charmed.description: Charmed: The creature regards the charmer as a trusted ally and may be influenced to act in their interest.

confused.description: Confused: The creature's actions become erratic and unpredictable.

dazed.description: Dazed: The creature is disoriented and can take only a single move or standard action per round.

deafened.description: Deafened: The creature cannot hear, suffering a -4 penalty on Perception checks that rely on sound.

dying.description: Dying: The creature's hit points are below 0, causing it to lose 1 hit point per round until stabilized.

fatigued.description: Fatigued: The creature is exhausted, taking a -2 penalty on Strength- and Dexterity-based skill checks.

flatfooted.description: Flat-footed: The creature is caught off-guard, losing its Dexterity bonus to AC and any dodge bonuses.

frightened.description: Frightened: The creature is overwhelmed by fear, suffering a -2 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

grappled.description: Grappled: The creature is restrained by an opponent, suffering a -4 penalty on Dexterity-based skill checks.

immobilized.description: Immobilized: The creature is completely unable to move from its current position.

paralyzed.description: Paralyzed: The creature is frozen in place, unable to move or take any actions except free actions, and loses its Dexterity bonus to AC.

petrified.description: Petrified: The creature is turned to stone, becoming immobile and inanimate.

sickened.description: Sickened: The creature is overcome by nausea, taking a -2 penalty on most ability and skill checks.

staggered.description: Staggered: The creature is so unsteady that it can take only a single move or standard action per round.

stunned.description: Stunned: The creature is so disoriented that it can take no actions except free actions, and suffers a -2 penalty to AC.

unconscious.description: Unconscious: The creature is knocked out, losing its Dexterity bonus to AC and considered helpless.

enfeebled.description: Enfeebled: The creature's Strength is reduced, affecting its ability to perform Strength-based actions.

dazzled.description: Dazzled: The creature is affected by bright light, suffering a -1 penalty on Perception checks that rely on sight.

entangled.description: Entangled: The creature is caught in a restraining substance, suffering a -2 penalty on Dexterity-based skill checks.
